meanings.definition: The quality or state of being mutagenic.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the mutagenicities of the chemicals in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Exposure to radiation can increase the mutagenicities of cells.
meanings.sent3: The mutagenicities of the radioactive substance made the cells dance like disco balls.
meanings.sent4: The mutagenicities of the virus spread through the population like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The mutagenicities of the mutagen caused chaos in the genetic code.

meanings.definition: The ability to cause genetic mutations.
meanings.sent1: Researchers are investigating the mutagenicities of certain chemicals on DNA.
meanings.sent2: Mutagenicities in the environment can lead to changes in organisms over time.
meanings.sent3: The mutagenicities of the cosmic rays turned the aliens into superheroes.
meanings.sent4: The mutagenicities of the potion transformed the ordinary frog into a prince.
meanings.sent5: The mutagenicities of the mutagen were so powerful, they altered the course of evolution.
